name: Raven Bow
desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Tile of Decarabian's Tower
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.

materials.name: Heavy Horn
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Heavy Horn
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Black Crystal Horn
materials.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

materials.name: Weathered Arrowhead
materials.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Scattered Piece of Decarabian's Dream
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but because the harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambition of the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.
He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of that dream are still mighty.

materials.name: Black Crystal Horn
materials.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

materials.name: Weathered Arrowhead
materials.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Weapon Overview</color>
Secondary stat increases <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color>
Passive increases <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> against enemies affected by <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> or <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Character</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Reasoning</color>

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

customize.text: The weapon's <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> would increase Ganyu's <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reaction DMG</color> . Since the passive increases <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> against enemies affected by <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> or <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> , placing Ganyu in a <color=#ffd780>Melt</color> team would best maximize the potential <color=#ffd780>DMG</color> .

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

customize.text: Childe can easily utilize the weapon's passive through his <color=#ffd780>Charged</color> <color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color> , <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color> or <color=#ffd780>Burst</color> . Focusing on <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reaction DMG</color> , this weapon would work well in a <color=#ffd780>Bloom</color> or <color=#ffd780>Vaporize</color> team.

customize.name: Amber
customize.desc: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.text: Amber can easily utilize the weapon's passive through her <color=#ffd780>Charged</color> <color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color> , <color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color> or <color=#ffd780>Burst</color> . Focusing on <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reaction DMG</color> , this weapon would work well in a <color=#ffd780>Burgeon</color> team.

customize.name: Collei
customize.desc: A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.

customize.text: In a <color=#ffd780>Bloom</color> or <color=#ffd780>Burgeon</color> team, this weapon will increase <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reaction DMG</color> due to its focus on <color=#ffd780>Elemental Mastery</color> . The weapon's passive will also increase <color=#ffd780>Elemental Reaction DMG</color> further.

value.text: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by <color=#37ffff>12%/15%/18%/21%/24%</color> .

value.name: Raven Bow
value.desc:
Bane of Flame and Water: Raven Bow

Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. As such, hunters would decorate their bows' limbs with feathers which forebode the imminent death of their targets.

desc.text:
Ravens are messengers of death.
"Placing this feather on the limb of one's bow
declares the death of one's prey."
Or so claimed the weapon vendors.
